document_data.mainbody:
azeer was a member of the College of Conjuration in the city of Sshamath.
In the , alongside Gilkriz, Mazeer was one of the conjurers sent to help teleport the combined force of Sshamath wizards and priests of Eilistraee to the main temple of Kiaransalee, which they planned to attack.
Later, she, along with Telmyz, a Nightshadow, were scouting underwater tunnels for a way to locate Kiaransalees temple. But they were attacked by a giant water spider. Telmyz was yanked out of the water and Mazeer summoned a water elemental that broke two of the spiders legs and turned into a powerful whirlpool.
After the destruction of Kiaransalee and of the Voidstone, the priestesses of Eilistraee went out to search for her body in order to bring it back to the Promenade of the Dark Maiden and try to resuscitate her.
